instructions:
Rinse scallops and pat dry. Toss in melted margarine to coat. Mix remaining ingredients. Dip one flat
side of scallop in crumb mixture and place on broiler pan, crumb side up. Broil 3 inches from heat without
turning for about 5 minutes or until opaque throughout. Serve with lemon wedges. 
*(Rev. 1/29/93)*
name: Broiled Scallops
